description: A healthy traditional potato salad that goes well as a side dish for meat or chicken.
name: Insalata Di Patate (Potato Salad) Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a small saucepan place potatoes and salt, cover with cold water. Cook on medium heat for 20 minutes or until tender. You can use a knife to pierce them to see if they are cooked right through.
Remove from heat and drain potatoes. Set aside to cool completely before peeling.
Peel cold potatoes and cut in small medium sized cubes.
Place all cubed potatoes in a stainless steel bowl.
Add veggie salt, oregano, extra virgin olive oil and chilli flakes.
Gently toss well, making sure not to use a spoon to combine in order to preserve the shape of the potatoes. Transfer to serving bowl. Enjoy!
